import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ChevronRight, Download, ExternalLink, Github, Briefcase } from 'lucide-react'; import ProgressiveImage from '../components/ProgressiveImage'; import { personalInfo, featuredProjects, skills } from '../data/portfolio'; const Home: React.FC = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section */}
{/* Background image with a soft gradient overlay */}

{personalInfo.name}

{personalInfo.subtitle}

{personalInfo.bio}

View My Work Download Resume
{/* Featured Projects */}

Featured Projects

Showcasing innovative solutions in advanced embedded systems, mechatronics, antenna design, and electromagnetic simulation

{featuredProjects.map((project) => (
{project.images[0] && ( )}

{project.title}

{project.description}

{project.technologies.slice(0, 3).map((tech) => ( {tech} ))} {project.technologies.length > 3 && ( +{project.technologies.length - 3} more )}
Learn More {project.githubUrl && ( e.stopPropagation()} > )}
))}
View All Projects
{/* Skills Overview */}

Skills & Technologies

Expertise across multiple domains of electrical engineering and software development

{skills.map((skill) => (
{ e.currentTarget.src = '/images/skills/fallback.svg'; }} />

{skill.name}

))}
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Collaborate?

Let's work together to bring your next engineering project to life

Get In Touch Try Engineering Tools
); }; export default Home;
